episodes.title: Inside the Jesus Army: A Gripping Cult Crime Documentary
episodes.description:
Delve into the dark world of religious extremism with "Inside the Jesus Army: A Gripping Cult Crime Documentary". This true crime documentary tells the shocking true story of the Jesus Army. Some members used faith as a means to deceive, manipulate and even abuse their followers. Explore the twisted psychology behind cult leaders and their followers, and discover the sinister crimes that were committed in the name of religion. From the UK to the world, this documentary exposes the dangers of blind faith and the devastating consequences of cult deception. 
LISTENER CAUTION IS ADVISED 
  
This episode was researched and written by Emily G. Thompson.
Script editing, additional writing, illustrations and production direction by Rosanna Fitton
Narration, audio editing, script editing, and production direction by Benjamin Fitton
Video editing by Adam Yates. 

More information and episode references can be found on our website, theywalkamonguspodcast.com

The audio was originally published on Wednesday, June 19, 2022, under 'Bonus Episode 18' of They Walk Among Us.

MUSIC: 
Foretold by Shimmer 
Aurora by Colossus
Deep Thoughts by Elision 
Bio by Lincoln Davis 
Tuatha De Danann by Third Age 
Count Backwards From 10 by Glasseyes 
Beyond The Bridge by Caleb Etheridge
